info: Working on a connected pill bottle and mobile application to help patients remember medication.
Worked on the Groove Music and Movies & TV applications for Windows 10. Worked specifically with media metadata and content queries.
Backend software developer for a small credit card analytics startup. I worked on the user analytics engine, stats aggregation processes, and the merchant recommendation platform.

My responsibilities included teaching a weekly discussion section, holding office hours, managing projects, and helping to write/grade exams. Teaching other CS students for the past few semesters has been very rewarding for me.
Worked on an application called myTime to help struggling students keep on top of their schedules and sync with their Google Calendars.
Developed a boot-insert prototype that monitors a soldier's weight and gait with Arduino-based hardware. This system would communicate with a computer and transmit data in real time.
Developed and maintain a web presence for my mother's breakfast and lunch caf√©. Waited tables during summers.
